title: Congress Tweets Edited Photo Targeting Modi Govt on #WorldSleepDay
subtitle: Fact Check: Congress  official Twitter handle on 15 March shared a picture of a truck which carried a signboard cautioning other vehicles from blowing the horn since “the Modi govt was asleep,” with the hashtag #WorldSleepDay
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Tweeting out the original picture of the truck, Zubair also noted that writer Madhu Kishwar had earlier shared the same picture on 20 February 2018.

Similarly, IPS officer Sanjiv Bhatt too had shared the same picture on 22 February 2018.

Both Kishwar and Bhatt were called out by other users on Twitter for having shared a picture that was quite obviously photoshopped, but are yet to take down their tweets.

This story has previously been debunked by Times Fact Check and The Print's HoaXposed.
